scripts.setup:jwt_private_key: node scripts/generate-es256-key.mjs | wrangler secret put JWT_PRIVATE_KEY --env=production
scripts.setup:code_private_key: node scripts/generate-jwe-key.mjs | wrangler secret put CODE_PRIVATE_KEY --env=production
scripts.setup:state_secret: openssl rand --base64 32 | wrangler secret put STATE_SECRET --env=production
